description: A notification of a Level 3 event shall be defined as a work calendar.
comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.04-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 4: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

contents.name: definedBy
contents.description: The work calendar definition defining this work calendar.

contents.name: contains
contents.description: The work calendar entry(s) that are part of this work calendar.

contents.name: hasValuesOf
contents.description: This work calendar is defined in part by the work calendar definition property(s).

contents.name: description
contents.description: Additional information about the work calendar

contents.name: hierarchyScope
contents.description: Identifies where the exchanged information fits within the role based equipment hierarchy. Optionally, hierarchy scope defines the scope of the equipment class, such as the site or area where it is defined.

contents.name: hierarchyScopeRel
contents.comment: Not part of the Standard Specs.
